about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Find young Liam's way home while exploring a mysterious cave full of danger in this pixel art action platformer. Pull your way out using your grappling hook, meet unique characters and overcome hundreds of hand crafted challenges to decide Liam's fate

Swing Through


Use your grappling hook to grab and swing through danger
Help Liam traverse and reach difficult places with it

Dodge Danger


There are all kinds of danger in this mysterious cave
Run and doge as you explore your way out

Strike Back


You are not limited to just running away
Aim and shoot your grappling hook on various enemies and obstacles

Try Again Immediately


Reloads are instant. Try again from where you left without starting over
No long and boring respawn cycles

Make Friends


Meet interesting characters along your way
Friends or foes? Find out the story behind them

Overcome Obstacles


Solve puzzles to progress
Put your skills to test in this precision platformer

Explore


Keep an eye open
You might find some hidden paths in your way

Find young Liam's way home while exploring a mysterious cave full of danger in this pixel art action platformer. Pull your way out using your grappling hook, meet unique characters and overcome hundreds of hand crafted challenges to decide Liam's fate

Help Liam traverse and reach difficult places with it

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system; Other configuration and user environment as provided by default with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.); Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system; Other configuration and user environment as provided by default with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.); Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers

name: Liam's Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Officially supported hardware vendor drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Officially supported hardware vendor drivers
